thread.title: Kenya: Mind Your Own Business, Museveni Told
thread.title_full: Kenya: Mind Your Own Business, Museveni Told

title: Kenya: Mind Your Own Business, Museveni Told
text:
Ethiopia: ICT Development Towards Trade 
They spoke at Oyugis Township during the launch of a voter registration drive for Homa Bay county. 
On Friday, Museveni said Cord leader Raila Odinga should stop wasting his time opposing the deal allowing Ugandan sugar imports. 
He said Ugandan sugar should be allowed into Kenya without impediment. 
Museveni spoke to the East Africa Legislative Assembly in Kampala. 
"We are ready and will continue to fight the deal which is meant to make our people from the Western regions that depend on sugar plantation to suffer," Mbadi said. 
Magwanga urged Kenyans not to buy Ugandan sugar. 
"Let us promote our own economy," he said. Kenya
